title: How It Works Book of 101 Amazing Facts You Need To Know Volume 2
description:
<a href="http://i.imgur.com/Ej0OlD1.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://i.imgur.com/Ej0OlD1.png</a>


Do you know why plankton glows in the dark? Ever wondered what the Goldilocks Zone is? Fancy learning how to drift a car? Covering the environment, technology, science, space, transport and history, this newly revised collection of conundrums and curiosities will satisfy even the hungriest of minds. Featuring: Environment - Who owns the world's pandas, how pearls are formed and more. Technology - How anti-venom is made, how to capture light trails and more. Space - Who owns the moon, why Pluto is or isn't a planet and more. Transport - How to drift in a car, how brake fluid works and more
